ISSUE.TITLE: Why a CLA is required to contribute on Gitness?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Why is there a CLA for Gitness which is basically allowing to relicense the complete contribution to another license? Have you considered to use a Developer Certificate of Origin? https://developercertificate.org/ https://cla-assistant.io/harness/drone?pullRequest=3355
